projectpokemon.logic.StatStages

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StatStages Move.getEnemyStatStages()
      Returns the move's enemyStatStages
      StatStages BattleVariables.getPlayer1Stages()
      Returns the player1Stages
      StatStages BattleVariables.getPlayer2Stages()
      Returns the player2Stages
      StatStages Move.getSelfStatStages()
      Returns the move's selfStatStages
      StatStages Pokemon.getStatStages()
      Returns the pokemon's StatStages

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sets the enemyStatStages to the given StatStages.

      Sets the player2Stages to the given StatStages

      Sets the selfStatStages to the given StatStages.
      void Battle.setStages(StatStages self, StatStages enemy, Trainer who)
      Sets both player's stages attribute in the BattleVariables according to the given Trainer.
      void Pokemon.setStatStages(StatStages statStages)
      Sets the pokemon's StatStages to the given StatStages
